title: [Question] MARKS AND GRADE RELATION
content: 2nd sem results are out , for reval it would be helpful to know for what marks what grade was given if there was relative grading and know lab scores and even if there was relative grading or not .. Is there any way in which we can know this?

comments.body: pretty sure for maths (chem cycle), A grade was like for 75/100 reduced total, might be 76 max, the rest as normal range given in faqs, nothing was reduced

Just take 4-5 friends who have gotten approx same gpa as yours to do script review. Compare each other's marks and correspondence grade. Add up their isa n esa marks and compare with yours. This is the best way to guess cutoffs
i got B’s into late 60s too
Ohh damn okay I'll check my paper n decide

Which cycle and for which subjects 
And also how was ur isa avg like incase u cld give a rough estimate also would help
chem cycle isas were lowest being 35 highest 41
which subject are you ralking about?
so relative happened only for maths?
yeah pretty sure,im in border of all subjects so ik :(
thanks man and better luck next time 💪
Wanted to know for mech stats epd and math in specific
Talking about chem cycle even mech stats feels relative not sure where they split the grade tho anyone who has seen their marks cld reply n let us know pls
oh same i also wanted to know for mech, any idea?

Apparently seems like 75 but not sure im not finding anyone with 75 and A i only know ppl who got B with 74 and A with 80 really need someone to update if they lie in between the range and their grade 😭🙏🏻🙏🏻
